localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Text Blaze allows you to save text snippets and insert them anywhere on the web using keyboard shortcuts. Snippets can be plain text, but can also include dynamic dates, formulas, real-time input and integrations with other apps. Try it, it's free!
blogPost.body: Text Blaze allows you to save text snippets and insert them anywhere on the web using keyboard shortcuts. Snippets can be plain text, but can also include dynamic dates, formulas, real-time input and integrations with other apps. Try it, it's free!
blogPost.title: Text Blaze - Save time by eliminating repetitive typing
blogPost.author: Kat Manalac

localize.description: Text Blaze允许您保存文本片段，并使用键盘快捷键将其插入到网络上的任何地方。短片可以是纯文本，但也可以包括动态日期、公式、实时输入以及与其他应用程序的集成。试试吧，它是免费的
localize.tagline: 消除重复打字，节省时间。

localize.description: Text Blaze允許您保存文本片段，並使用鍵盤快捷鍵將其插入到網絡上的任何地方。短片可以是純文本，但也可以包括動態日期、公式、實時輸入以及與其他應用程序的集成。試試吧，它是免費的
localize.tagline: 消除重複打字，節省時間。

previous.title: Covid-19 hospitalizations in the US were down 11% over the past week, the 60th consecutive day of week-over-week declines. Down 72% from their peak on Jan 6. 🙏 https://t.co/vV41Xn8DVX

localize.full_text: 过去一周，美国科维德-19住院人数下降11%，这是连续60天周环比下降。较1月6日的峰值下降72%。🙏 https://t.co/vV41Xn8DVX
過去一週，美國科維德-19住院人數下降11%，這是連續60天周環比下降。較1月6日的峯值下降72%。🙏 https://t.co/vV41Xn8DVX
